body:
**Australian Open Picks and odds**.

We love betting futures. And we've always got a ticket on the tennis majors.

Often we try to find value outside of Novak (hasn't been a great idea). 

Medvedev and Tsitsipas at like 101 and 67 in recent years respectively.

And we love betting on the Ladies as well. You can normally find three or four really good price tickets.

Our favorite free resource, while we build our tennis models, is **[Ace Previews](https://publc.com/content/Ace-Tennis-Previews.19235949)**. 

So keep an eye on his stuff but obviously keep coming back to the Refinery.

We've got a brilliant sports betting tennis model that will run all year in 2021. We're just plugging him in for the Aussie Open.

Until those outputs and a futures preview are available, check out the odds below.

- - -
